name: Hotel Bergkristall
description:
Hotel Bergkristall in Hippach in Zillertal on the doorstep to Ski Zillertal 3000
 
During your stay in our family run 3* Hotel in Hippach in Zillertal, you will be exceptionally well looked after by your hosts, Andrea and Sigi. Head chef, Andrea, will delight your taste buds every day with her national and international culinary creations. 
Nestled in the beautiful mountains of the Zillertal Alps, our hotel is close to Mayrhofen and directly next to the Zillertal Höhenstrasse and is the perfect starting point for countless activities and excursions in both summer and winter.
Our Hotel Bergkristall Highlights:
Our Bergkristall luxury board with a generous breakfast buffet and 4 course choice of evening meals 
Our Bergkristall Spa facilities with Kristall Room, Zillertal herbal sauna and Physiotherm infrared cabins 
Only 16 family or double rooms - at Bergkristall you will enjoy wonderful holidays with a friendly ambience 
Our unique Bergkristall Alpine Hut with barbeque evenings in summer and après-ski in winter 
Free ski bus direct to the top station of the Zillertal 3000 ski resort lifts (10 min. journey) 
Free Wi-Fi throughout the entire hotel.
